reviews.review:
Très bon jeu, au scénario assez tordu. Immersif dès le début.
Personnellement, j'ai pris mon temps pour tout visiter tellement c'est bien réalisé au niveau graphique et ambiance.
La difficulté ne reste pas énorme, comme tout bioshock précédent. Mais ça fait passer quelques bonnes heures de jeu.
Love it!
molto bello.. bella grafica.. intro da paura.. spettacolare, il più bel gioco ke abbia mai giocato, piacerà un casino a ki ama gli rpg XD
yes
Awesome story, great FPS.  I still have to play BioShock 2.  This game is a huge improvement from the original.  Will be playing again and again!
Really fun game. If you liked the first Bioshock, this one is a great followup. I recommend getting the DLC too.
fun game
Ate a hotdog 11/10
Это самая замечательная игра. Великолепный геймплей, сеттинг, история от Кена Левина, и не менее великий саундтрек от признаного мастера Гарри Шимана.

Simplismente fantastico o final é interpretativo ou seja nao tem certo ou errado o jogo lhe proporciona TOTAL liberdade de escolha esse nao é um jogo e sim uma obra de arte! minha unico "contra" é que esta muito além de um bioshock deveria ser um titulo novo mas agora falta as DLCS shaushuash
Збс игра,всем советую!

스토리 이해를 엔하위키 보면서 했습니다. 명작은 명작인데 스토리랑 전투씬이랑 따로노는 부분이 다소 아쉽습니다.
전 시리즈들과는 다르게 무기 제한도 있고 가장 큰 문제점이 회복 키트를 들고 다닐 수 없게 해놓은 건데 이게 정말 게임난이도를 미치게 만듭니다.한가지 팁을 드리자면 체력 쉴드 소금 투자할 때 체력 몰빵은 하지 마세요. 정말 이건 아니지 싶더라구요..ㅠㅠ
게임 플레이보단 스토리에 중점을 둔 작품이라고 생각합니다. 
dlc 에서 전시리즈에 이어서 랩쳐 배경으로 콜라보 되서 반가운 스플라이서찡들을 다시 볼 수 있습니다!
Una historia genial

Bevor ich "BioShock Infinite" begann, hatte ich nur ´den ersten Teil angespielt und zugegeben, erst mal bei Seite gelegt, weil ich nicht in die Story rein kam und leider zu viele andere Spiele gleichzeitig gezockt habe. (Ich werde BioShock trotzdem noch eine Chance geben, nur möchte ich mich voll darauf einlassen können). Diesen fatalen Fehler wollte ich beim dritten Teil nicht machen, daher gab es ein von mir selbst ausgehangenes Verbot für andere Spiele in dieser Zeit (so würde ich es auch jedem empfehlen, welcher nicht vor hat das Ding in einem Rutsch durch zu spielen). Trotz einer recht beachtlichen Laufzeit von 10 bis 13 Stunden ging "BioShock Infinite" wie im Flug vorbei, weil man es wirklich wie in Trance erlebt. "Erlebt" ist wohl das richtige Wort dafür, denn dieses Spiel ist ein wahrhaft atemberaubendes Erlebnis, von Anfang bis Ende. Die geniale Story lässt einen Twist auf den Nächsten und eine denkwürdige Szene auf die Nächste folgen. Die Level Größe war für mich genau richtig, denn man kann sich hier weder verlaufen (der Pfeil hat geholfen), noch das Gefühl von Linearität bekommen. Das Design der Stadt Columbia ist schlichtweg wunderschön und detailverliebt, obwohl leider hin und wieder Klone auftauchen, doch diese fallen in den rasanten und actionreichen Gefechten selten auf. Dabei hat man eine überschaubare Anzahl an Waffen zur Auswahl, welche in Verbindung mit den immer wichtiger werdenden Plasmiden gut funktionieren. Das Spiel mit verschiedenen Features, wie den Luftschienen hat gute Unterhaltung und Kurzweil zur Folge. 
Abseits vom Bombast gelingt es dem Spiel mit kleinen Szenen und Stellen noch viel dichter und fesselnder zu sein. Fast jedes Ereignis bleibt bis kurz vor Schluss ein großes Rätsel. Wenn einem dann im letzten Drittel (und auch im sonstigen Verlauf) ein Twist nach dem nächsten durchs Gehirn peitscht, ist die Auflösung so genial, so unvorhersehbar und so unübertrefflich, dass ich das Gefühl hatte, es hier mit einer besten Geschichten (auch verglichen mit allen Filmen dieser Welt) aller Zeiten zu tun zu haben. Hier steckt das wahre Genie des Spiels (welches man wohl erst nach dem lesen von diversen Erklärungen und Nächten voller Überlegungen erkennt): Alles ist wirklich sinnvoll wie ein gigantisches Puzzle verbunden, um den Spieler dann in kompletter Fassungslosigkeit zurück zu lassen. Selten waren Charaktere so tiefgehend und so gut wie hier. Vor allem Elizabeth ist ein fantastischer Charakter, welcher sofort Interesse für ihre Hintergrundgeschichte weckt. Auch Fans der ersten beiden Teile werden mit reichlichen Referenzen und Zitaten bedient. Auch sonst werden reichliche Anspielungen auf Wissenschaftliche Theorien gemacht. Was das Verständnis all dieser angeht, so setzt „BioShock“ dieses voraus.
Bei einer solchen Story wird das gute Gameplay fast zur Nebensache. Wobei man auch sagen muss, dass man hier nicht besonders gefordert wird, wenn es um Skill geht. Die große Herausforderung ist es sich die vielen kleinen Story Details während der Shooter Einlagen zu merken. 
Einen Multiplayer hat man sich zum Glück verkniffen, Errungenschaften gibt`s dennoch.
Alles in allem ist "BioShock Infinite" ein optisch opulenter, erwachsener Meilenstein (und ein Meisterwerk) was Erzählung, Spannung, Atmosphäre, Wendungen, Tiefgang und Charaktere angeht und bietet ein Finale welches mit so viel Fingerspitzengefühl inszeniert und erzählt wird, dass es seinesgleichen sucht. Welcher Banause heute noch meint Spiele währen Kulturgut zweiter Klasse, der wird seine Meinung durch dieses Meisterwerk ändern (müssen).

O game até que é legal de jogar, os gráficos são excelentes, a história é muito boa, as mecânica do jogo, os personagens enfim é uma excelente aquisição. Nada comparado a primeiro ou segundo pois esse parece ser totalmente diferente e para mim que estava na balada dos anteriores fiquei meio decepcionado. Porém é bom e merece seu destaque.

Эта игра-великолепна! Она хороша всем, графикой, сюжетом, но особенно хороша Элизабет.
10/10
Nothing to see here... Just the most amazing game I have ever played, you know, nothing much.
Awesome

In terms of graphics and creativity in the design of Columbia and all its corners, Bioshock Infinite is a role model for the gaming industry. When I first entered the city in the sky, I was astonished by the deep, beautiful design and the love to detail that I encountered. The atmosphere of the roaring 20s and industrial progress was amazingly integrated and makes me as a lover of history smile even more. 
Elizabeth is with no doubt one of the best sidekicks ever animated for gaming, with her unique character and beautiful model she is definitely able to stand next to Alyx Vance in the row for best sidekicks in gaming. 
But now to the gameplay: The gameplay itself works fluently and offers a great experience with the vigors  which bring a great deal of variety with them, but there is not a lot the player does except shooting and killing. You do not have to think at all, just walk through corridors and shoot people, since you can always check where you have to go. 
Also, Elizabeth is maybe a little bit too much of a help, since it is pretty hard to find a battle challenging when someone keeps throwing medicine and salts at someone, making you some kind of demigod. 
Fazit: Bioshock Infinte is beautiful and astonishing in its great graphics and its unique, breathtaking design, but only offers a minimum variety in terms of gameplay. It is worth to take a look at though, since you have never ever seen something like the city of Columbia in any game before!
This is a great game with a little clear ending, I advise everyone to play!

Mind Blown! Amazing story line and concept, stunning visuals and you still get that classic bioshock 'drink the odd liquid in the bottle you just found even though you don't know what it is' touch. 11/10

I just try this game today....I have no idea what going on with this games but it kidda fun and the graphic is so beautiful....This game took me to wonder land :D  ...HIS GAME GRASH too much then resatart from the check point. I played for 9 hrs only 7% of the game because the game keep restart.
The best story I have ever played. Better than the first game, better than any game.

i played the first 2 bioshocks and the so far its not very bioshocky. i am very thorough when playing these, but its just after dewitt meets elizabeth (not a spoiler its in the description =P) plasmids have been renamed vigors, the health system is very different, but so far the game and story i have found to be very engrossing (was up til 330am after starting it at 1130pm and having an early start the next day XD) its kind of the opposite of rapture so far by the i mean bright and dry (being a floating city.... it makes sense) and so far no f bombs =( which again does fit the story. definately worth a look but i say wait til its on sale like i did
Definitly one of the best games i have ever played!!

If you're looking for an exciting alternative to shooters that revolve around your ability to make dull, repetitive love to as many walls as possible, this is the game for you. As an exciting adventure with blazing gunfights this MAY suffice. Not on hard difficulty anyways...

BioShock Infinite is peculiar in that it seems to hit the gaming equivalent of the uncanny valley. Its just shy of perfection and because of it all its flaws somehow become twisted deformities. Perhaps medium difficulty is all it takes to make this game perfect. If I can even stomach the thought of a second playthrough I may find out.

Difficulty. Early on I thought it had managed the perfect sweet spot of challenge. Not quite beating me mercilessly for my mistakes, not quite allowing me to move unopposed. I could freely run and gun and I was quite enjoying, hard difficulty was doing what its supposed to. As the difficulty increases, the ability to enjoy a run-and-gun experience diminishes as dry humping walls and picking enemies off with headshots becomes the norm. Taking on multiple enemies simultaneously while exposed is almost futile with how quickly you can end up dead. I'm (HOPEFULLY) nearing the end of this calamity of a game and by this point i've resorted to abusing enemy AI as much as possible because some fights are just beyond doable without dying. The battle outside Comstock's house was so many levels of busted. Enemies that respawn virtually the second I kill them? An enemy that can in one hit take out shields and a significant chunk of health if i'm too close? Multiple enemies in a relatively small area ensuring staying there and surviving is nigh impossible? I camped quite a ways away, abusing the ability to endlessly recycle mesquitos to buy me time while I chipped away at the important enemy, who has enough health to survive your average nuclear warhead.

This is not the game design of something that has positive reviews thrown at it like its a story about Mother freakin' Theresa saving orphans from Nazis.

Plot. Its great and all, but the plot has become the crux of what holds this game together for me, and why i'm still bothering to play to the end. There's that small sliver of naive hope in my head saying "don't worry, they knew better at one point, things will get better!" When i'm not enjoying the story I find myself thinking "why am I doing this at all?" I'll spin my scroll wheel quickly to watch the screen shake while running from place to place. I'll stop playing and just lay down because that's less boring (i'm not exaggerating). I enter combat with the literal thought "not this crap again PLEASE". I'm more excited by picking up another voxaphone than any new upgrade or secret stash of goodies. I might as well just a watch all the cutscenes on Youtube.

Combat. BioShock Infinite started out as something that I wanted, an alternative to the cover-based combat that permeates most modern shooters and even some that I like and play. It was fast-paced and I rarely spent a moment in combat out of motion. Those were the moments where I needed to sit back, wait, and let my shields recharge. The melee enemies are in someways a brilliant addition despite their (general) ease to pick off because toss a couple in or have them flank and you'll enjoy getting bashed in the head. Being fluid and dictating combat instead of having it dictated for you was rewarded, and you're armed with vigors from lightning to crows to mad dash attacks to help keep things offensive rather than defensive. Skylines are a great thing, the mobility it offers leads to exciting possibilities as you jump like a madman on one enemy then turn to her buddy and fill his face with buckshot.

But, as its heart, BioShock Infinite was built with the current generation of FPS players in mind. Who totally need every micromanagement instruction this game has to offer lest they get bored because the game isn't condescending enough. Cover combat became the norm as enemies became tougher to deal with and you're guided every step of the way. Right down to being reminded to use vigors. It says something poor when a game has to remind you to use one of its central mechanics.

There's also a big problem of a lot of guns in BSI just being awful. I found the Vox weaponry as worthwhile as something out of Ride to Hell Retribution. It says something equally poor when I can compare any part of a game to Ride to Hell.

So, BioShock Infinite. Pick it up for $5 and give it a go. Don't bother with hard unless you're looking for a sleeping aid. I'm sure on medium it ends up being a great game, and that's fine, but I can do the same with a lot of games that are normally played passively with an emphasis on cover combat. I can play CoD4 on hardened where there isn't the artificial difficulty of veteran preventing me from running at heavily fortified houses quickly picking enemies off and clearing rooms with a shotgun, but there just isn't any challenge to be had.

My fingers are still crossed for the remote (see completely unlikely) possibility that medium manages to somehow fix the faults which cripple what could've been one of the best games ever made.

I have played all Bioshock games before this and I am super angry at this moment because I was about half way through this game when it corrupted my save files for no good reason.  In any game with any thought I could just go back two or three games and lose maybe half an hour of gameplay but no, not in Bioshock Infinite!  Because the system saves when it wants instead of when you want and then screws up and all of your effort is for nothing.  No options to simply copy back a backup file.  I have wasted many hours and money on a game I will never see the end of or play again because of the sheer frustration it has caused me with this save game stupidity!
one of the best games ive played it definitely messed with my head 10/10 ign

WOW is all I can say about BioShock Infinite.
A cool story that will leave you feeling a little sad at it's conclusion but also then bring a smile to your face, after the credits, that will make you want to play through again. While the characters that you meet in the game are quite well done, I found that the music was quite awesome. I am not a religious person but I did like that small break in the game where Booker and Elizabeth break into a very cool song. 
The thing that I didn't like about the game was the final battle, that seemed to video gamey for such a mature story. And yes the story is what drives you forward, all the ambiguosness makes your want to find what the hell those two are talking about ( He doesn't row!) makes sense later.
Some will say that the gunplay doesn't feel right or that the gameplay might be too easy, I may agree if I didn't just stick to he carbine and machine gun. Some will say that the lack of innovative weapons is a "deal breaker", not eveything has to be re-invented. I found that the weapons were just fine for killing everything I seen. The powers that you get are quite interesting and I never really used them as I prefered to get headshots and hold my ground near a corner, my style of playing really didn't warrant all the powers and skyhooks. I shoot and move, repeat. I still enjoyed it though and will play again using the powers and that crazy ass skyhook.
Graphics are quite good and the sounds are also good, the music is what I enjoyed. Cyndi Lauper's "Girls just want to have fun" was a treat, same with that Tears for Fears song "Everybody wants to rule the world"
So if you want a engaging game that will leave you with a tear in your eye at the conclusion then so play this game as it's definately one of the best written games in the last few years that really challenge your preceptions on what makes for a great game.

Got shot, ran into a bathroom, ate potatoes out of a toilet
10/10
obra de arte

As a huge fan of the first 2 Bioshock games I was extremely disapointed in how this game threw any aspect of horror and exploring a dying and forgotten world, what Infinite also throws out the window is any explanation for magic powers at all which makes me think "why is this even called Bioshock when it would be better if it was an independent title" what infinite also gets rid of is the ability to carry more than 2 weapons at once (damn modernization) which means weapon upgrades are kinda chancy cause you don't know what type of ammo you will have access to. Infinite also makes an unnessisarily complex plot in an attempt for good story telling (just because you are confused at the ending doesn't mean it was a good story) honestly the excessive use of the multiverse just makes it more complex than needed. In conclusion, Bioshock Infinite dissapointed me, it lacked any sense connection to the last games despite a transport to Rapture at the end just to say "WE CAN BE BIOSHOCK TOO", if you enjoy standard shooters that lack anything different from the norm this is the game for you, if you loved the first games as I did avoid this game like the plague it. just. isn't. bioshock.
Лучшая игра прошлого поколения

Ich hatte ziemlich hohe Erwartungen an BioShock Infinite, da es ja von allen Seiten nur gelobt wurde.

Leider hat mich das Spiel aber schwer enttäuscht. 
Die Kämpfe sind sehr langweilig. Ich fand bei Bioshock 2 die KI der Gegner irgendwie besser. Die Splicer konnten an wänden krabbeln und einen verfolgen - während hier die Gegner wie Zinnsoldaten hinter irgenwelchen Deckungen hocken bleiben.

Auch die hochgelobte Story hat bei mir nicht gewirkt. Genau genommen besteht die bis zum Ende nur aus einem Berg von Fragen, den man dann zum Schluss mit dem allbekannten paralel Universums Erkärungsversuch abschliesen will.
- Dabei bleiben bei genauerer Betrachtung viele Denkfehler (ich will aber jetzt hier nicht spoilern)

Meiner Meinung nach wird BioShock Infinite also nicht der Qualität der Vorgänger gerecht. Ich vermisse vor allem das Setting mit Adamsüchtigen, Little Sisters und Big Daddys.

Hoc est ingenium. Игра изумительная, гениальная! Всё в ней поражает: графика, аудио- и видеоэффекты, персонажи, атмосфера... но особенно захватывает сюжет. Сама лишь идея о параллельных мирах в высшей степени плодотворна, а при совмещении с наработками талантливых разработчиков, сценаристов и художников... она превращается в истинный шедевр - Bioshock Infinite. 


Это не просто шутер, это потрясающая игра, которая основывается на трёх китах: противоборстве государственных строев, теории разветвлённости пространственно-временного континуума и проблеме жизненного выбора. Звучит уже внушительно, не правда ли? Что ж, за одну концовку я ставлю десять баллов.
muito legal a historia
il gioco della vita.

I wouldn't say I am a BioShock fan. Before this game I had never played a BioShock Game before, but that doesn't matter at all. This game is pretty damn awesome! It took a while to get used to the controls, but the story, the graphics, the huge variety of guns and vigors make this game incredibly fun and interesting. I can only recommend it!

First of all, I would love to say thanks to team of Irrational Games for bringing me back to Rapture. I cant describe how wonderful to go back to one of my favorite places in videogames world. All i can say game design and atmosphere are incredible, I made about 200 screenshots! Well done!
I love the story. Its good to meet Booker and Elizabeth again.
DLC is quiet harder than the game itself, you are suffering from a lack of ammo and large amount of damage from splicers. And its a good thing!
So I will give this DLC 10/10, because I got everything I was expecting from this DLC. And I`m looking forward to Episode 2! The end of the Episode 1 left me so hungry

-Элизабет я умираю
-Лови патроны
-Я умираю суЧкА!
Элизабет ушла в себя.

A great, relatively focussed, shooter with an interesting, detailed world in which to play it. Good (if utterly bananas) plot, and some cunning tricks up its sleeves regarding gameplay. The combat, especially where skylines are involved, is strong, with a good mix of weapons and vigors, although I did feel clumsy at times facing multiple enemies, and the large open environments on the whole meant straight fights rather than cunning use of traps. On the down side - the environment simply isn't as beautiful or creepy as Rapture, the lack of a map function limits exploring to a certain extent, and Elizabeth (although cool) could have had a more interesting role in combat situations. 

Definitely worth it, didn't blow me away as much as the first Bioshock did.

If you have avoided spoilers of this game buy it asap and enjoy. The game is fun, can be a little repetitive at times, but by the end of the game your mind will be blown. Especially after you watch the explanation on youtube.
HOLY SHIT! Good as game, great FPS and Scares the crap out of you at points in time.

I got this game on a special and it was well worth it. I had been waiting a while to get it and I honestly was not disappointed. The graphics are cool and the spin on the story was a refreshing take on the Bioshock series. I didn't really play all of the DLC but some of it was kind of fun -- especially the arena stuff. I just think I had other things to hold my interest and I jumped from the game shortly after beating the storyline. 

This is pretty standard Bioshock, though. Great story, dark graphics (with bright new colors!) and decent controls. I don't think you will be disappointed.
elizabeth plox
People keep pineapples in their desks. 12/10
boring and redundant gunplay. the story starts off promising, but the further in you get the more fragmented and pieced together it becomes. At least it looks pretty...

Partway through the game, Elizabeth becomes 10x hotter.

10/10 best game
Histoire super intéressante et fuckée.

Last of Us, Ima let you finish, but BioShock Infinite was the game of the year
10/10
el juego mas asdahdakdsjalkdjadhkals de todos

Play as Troy Barker in this post-apocolyptic zombie thriller about an old man leading a young girl through certain danger in a floating city. Are the rumors true? Will the fireflies be able to cure Elizabeth's rift opening abilities through fungus therapy, ultimately saving mankind and dooming the zombies to extinction? Find out as you use guile, takedowns, plasmids, pistols, shotguns, flasks, molotov cocktails, and upgradeable weapons(you need to collect parts to upgrade gear at a workbench later in the game) to plow through merciless deathmachines created by the president of this floating palace, or use the shadows to your advantage to avoid the ever fearsome clickers(don't move when they click, that's how they hear you.) This game requires a lot of skill, especially when you hunt the deer later in the game when you play as Ellie, oh man I said too much, how do I delete text?! Frig! I hope no one I like reads this... 

11/10; the best Pentium/PC4 exclusive game money can buy!

Definitely better than the first two Bioshock games in my opinion.  It is just breathtaking beautiful visually and that ending...whew what a mindf@#k!

I have yet to hear of anyone who has played this game to say they did not enjoy it.
Good game, good story and gameplay. Actually it's awesome. Go play it!
Очень атмосферная игра с харизматичным главным героем и самым «живым» среди всех игр компаньоном.
This game is garbage.
Great story + good gameplay = Good Fun!
Стильно. Атмосферно. Оригинально. Отличный сюжет, связанный с игрой Bioshock.

Klasse Spiel! Die Zwischensequenzen bringen das richtige Flair rüber und die Atmosphäre die während der Kämpfe aufkommt ist einfach genial. Auch gibt es viele Möglichkeiten seine Spielfigur in verschiedene Richtungen zu entwickeln (durch Waffen, Boost und Ausrüstung). Scharfschützen, schwere Raketenwerfer und Zauberer werden ihren Spaß haben. ;-)
Masterpiece.
I liked the game that it wasn`t as dark as 1 or 2, but the story was a bit fucked up and the ending was very hard too undertand if you try to get only the big picture of the story.
Best game ever
Игра отличная ,графика тоже хорошая сюжет тоже отличный , так что не игра а конфетка .
I loved Bioshock 1 and 2 .. but This game !! this game is another league I love it !!! Amazing story and amazing gameplay ! i think i'm going to Buy all the dlc's
A rejouer pour comprendre l'histoire. Très joli et action à gogo!

自他共に認める借金まみれの見紛う事なき「人間のクズ」が渋々放り込まれた空中庭園。忘却へと葬り去った自分の過去。覚えていた暴力への喜びの感触。依頼主の欲する籠の中の小鳥。自分の置かれた状況を知らない彼女を最初に見たときにむき出しになった衝動。
「この鳥籠をめちゃくちゃに破壊してやりたい」
僕と彼女の出会いは偶然にすぎない･･･筈だった。

彼女には優しく誠実でありたい。それがクズである自分にできる罪滅ぼしであるかのように勝手に錯覚し、一緒に居るときはそう接していた。だがそれでも実際に自分がやった事と言えば、彼女に直接には偽らないように結局は陥れた事。彼女は涙を流し、唾棄し、僕から逃げ去った。僕はやはりクズには違いなかったのだ。解っている。だが、なぜだろう。そうであることは自分で認めているのに、諦められずティアの向こう側の彼女に絶叫する。
「お願いだから行かないでくれ！」

恋愛でも偽善でも欲望でもない。
BioShock Infiniteは僕とエリザベスによる愛の無限軌道。



＜バイオショックショック＞
「コンピュータゲームはまた一歩映画に接近した」。Fallout 3をプレイした時、僕はそういった感想を漏らしました。RPGにFPSを加え、アクション性を犠牲にすることによって強烈なシナリオを読ませるという辣腕ぶりは、映画コンテンツの大ファンである僕にとって大事件であって、創造センスが映画の追従に過ぎず、陳腐化を繰り返していると一時期見捨てていたコンピュータゲームコンテンツを見直そうと思わせた「フォールアウトショック」を引き起こしたのです。
後発となるBioShock Infiniteは恐るべきことにFallout 3で賞賛された核戦争後の退廃した世界観を追従することもなく、汎用性を犠牲にして独自のFPSの視覚を利用し、濃厚なシナリオを直結させるという手法をとっています。（ただしオールディーズ・アメリカというセンスでは追従していると言える）これは僕にとって第二の大事件であり「バイオショックショック」という節目を与えました。BioShock Infiniteは映画に接近したどころか「プレイする映画」という次元に到達しているのです。

＜最も賞賛されるべき演出力＞
FPSという視点は俳優を映し続けなければならないという制約がなく、映画以上のインパクトのある演出ができる。誰もが気づいていたけれど、おそらくは資金と人材能力的にどのメーカーも実現できなかった部分であると思います。部分的には他のFPSでも優れた演出はあるという意見をお持ちの方はいることでしょう。しかし、BioShock Infiniteほど最初から最後までノンストップの視覚演出にこだわりきった作品となれば、他作を挙げることはできないと僕は思います。

＜犠牲にされたFPSとしてのゲーム性＞
アクションゲーム、FPSとしての側面を見た場合、BioShock Infiniteは多くの人から良い評価を得られないことでしょう。アクションゲームとしては及第点ではあるものの、クセになる操作感、アクションゲーム独自の中毒性というFPSの本質に対するユーザの要望に応えられているシステムはなく、購入によるアップグレードやビガーの強化はゲーム性に貢献しているとは言えません。これほどの開発力を投入しても現代のコンピュータゲームにおいて、誰もがどの方向性からでも賞賛できる、万能の魅力のあるゲーム開発は難しいものであるという現実をBioShock Infiniteは我々に示しています。

＜全世界に向けに創造されたエリザベスというキャラクター＞
胸を強く打たれるのはエリザベスが多くの人種から見て魅力的に映ることであろうという点で、この全世界向けのモデリング、多言語吹き替えを成し遂げているのはまさしく「バイオショックショック」であり、メーカーがディズニー同様に世界市場で親しまれるキャラクターとして通用するためには、そういったものをきちんと仕掛けていかなくてはならないことをよく理解しているからだと言えます。BioShock Infiniteの開発にはいわゆるゲームオタクだけではなく、世界市場を見据えることのできる優秀な人材が集っていたことが伺えます。

바이오쇼크시리즈는 믿고하는 시리즈다.
한번해도 다시하고싶어질것이다.
BEST GAME EVER!!!!!!

This game is just beautiful in almost every way. The game mechanics are very unique bringing a new concept to first person shooters. The graphics are overwhelming  leaving you in awe and submersing you into the world they have created. While many other games deliver well on these first two points they fall way short of this series's dark disturbing but also heart warming story line filled with twists. The storyline is integrated through audiologs which you can either choose to look for and listen to or ignore if you just wish to proceed through the game. I recommend this to everyone.

Nice story and the gameplay is similar to the previous BioShock titles. What sets this installment apart is the way the story is driven by Elizabeth. I really felt like my character was travelling with her. A nice part of this setup was that I never had to worry about her getting killed. She was a capable companion, able to avoid danger on her own, which left me to only really have to worry about myself in combat situations. The available achievements encouraged me to try weapons out that I probably wouldn't have used otherwise. All in all, a fun title.
MUITO LEGAL MENES

BioShock Infinite ist der Knaller. Ich dachte, an den ersten Teil kann (vor allem nach dem eher mäßigen zweiten Teil) keine Forsetzung jemals mehr rankommen. Jetzt, nachdem ich das Spiel und die DLCs durchgezockt habe, frage ich mich sogar, ob der dritte Teil nicht sogar der beste der Trilogie ist.

Ich kann BioShock Infinite uneingeschränkt jedem empfehlen. Die Story ist weltklasse, das Spiel sieht super aus und selbst wenn man die ersten beiden Teile nicht gespielt hat, ist das kein Problem, denn der dritte Teil knüpft nur geringfügig an die Vorgänger an.

Zu "Burial at sea": Episode I fand ich megaschlecht, die zweite dafür aber richtig gelungen. Ich sag's mal so: Wenn man alle drei Teile durchgespielt haben sollte, halte ich die DLCs für einen Pflichtkauf, weil sie die Stories aller drei Teile miteinander verknüpfen. Wenn man nur Infinite gespielt hat, kann man zugreifen, muss man aber nicht.
One of the best story based games to come out in the recent years. Buy it or gtfo.

Um jogo muito bom, com ótima jogabilidade e historia incrível. Gráficos excelentes com uma ótima otimização. Suas missões são boas e que refletem no contexto do jogo. Efeitos e o modo que o jogo foi desenhado são muito bons e de alta qualidade.
Try not to fap, please.
looks great but... to short and to easy the first 2 bioshocks where better.

Потрясающая история, удивительная атмосфера, харизматичные персонажи.
графика, безусловно Оружия и способностей(энергетиков) не так уж и много. Но их можно комбинировать и улучшать по ходу игры. Того самого, жестокого, жуткого, даже немного мистического. Опять же, если вы играли в 1 часть, то Вы встретие много чего интересного: как мелкпие пасхалки, интересные мысли" о чем можно задуматся" на пару минут,так и персонажи .
9/10
Чудесная,красочная,атмосферная игра!
I totally recommend this game, the storyline is deep and totally enjoyable. Really amazing themes in the story as well

Jogo excelente! Facilmente um dos melhores trabalhos de ambientação que já vi em um jogo. Arquitetura dos edifícios, os afeitos sonoros, dublagem dos personagens, trilhas sonoras, tudo compôe um cenário que lhe absorve e faz você acreditar que está vivendo naquela Columbia inspirada nos Estados Unidos no início do século XX.
O jogo tem um enredo ótimo, cheio de surpresas e sem barrigas, ou seja; é explicado até o ponto certo de ser instigante. Sem explicar demais, nem de menos, deixando margem para interpretações e para a imaginação do jogador fazer também sua parte.
A Jogabilidade é muito fluída no PC (no console não joguei), sem nenhum problema nessa parte.
As únicas coisas que pecam e na dificuldade do jogo. Achei o modo normal um tanto "easy". E o fato do combate se tornar um pouco repetitivo com o tempo. Mas quando comecei a enjoar o jogo acabou, ou seja... Souberam a hora de fechar o "parque". Também senti falta de uma batalha final mais épica, talvez contra algum vilão mais expressivo e difícil de matar, mas talvez isso não fosse tão interessante para o enredo final do game.
Só para concluir, é um jogo que recomendo fortemente. Visualmente lindo e divertido, a Elizabeth é cativante, a história é ótima e ambientação perfeita.

Potete divertirvi, oppure potete giocare a Bioshock Infinite.

Nulla a che vedere con le atmosfere che hanno rese celebre Bioshock
Combattimenti noiosi e difficoltà calcolata per chi, poverino, ha moncherini al posto delle mani
Possibilità di usare i poteri in modo creativo non pervenuta
La varietà dei poteri è pari a quella delle canzoni di Ligabue
Il tuo avatar è tenuto in vita forzatamente da una balia che ha poteri molto funzionali ad allungare la storia in modo pretestuoso... tipo Lost

Insomma, considerando gli standard attuali è un buon gioco, e ha il pregio di avermi ricordato perché avessi smesso di videogiocare

Voto: 5 (che significa che 5 euri li vale anche, ma di sicuro non più di 5 ore del vostro tempo)

Хорошая графика! Главное тянет на слабых компьютерах!
Сюжет подкачал!
Жалко, что нет русской озвучки(((
Купил, не жалко.
Советую всем!

good story 
uninspired gameplay
WSPANIAŁA GRA! Jedna z najlepszych w jakie grałem, fabuła no po prostu świetna, a końcówka nieprzewidywalna i zadzwiająca. Mega gierka polecam każdemu ją przejść.

One of my favourite story games of all time. Awesome graphics, fun, combo-able powers with upgrades, realistic feeling guns with upgrades, Elizabeth <3 

What more can you want from Columbia?

poco da dire, il miglior bioshock della serie.......sono rimasto a bocca aperta con questo gioco, a causa di tutti i colpi di scena offerti dalla storyline. è coinvolgente a tal punto di farti credere davver che ci sia un modo per attraversare il spazio-tempo.
i personaggi sono magnifici, tutti con un carattere unico....
questo gioco è un opera d'arte!!!

This game is a game you have to play for any fan of fps. It has a story line that becomes more shocking as all the pieces start to click together. It has stunning graphics and good controls. The list could go on and on. 10/10 would play again

игра классная прошол 3 раза с удовольствием!!!
Минус только в том , что на последнем уровне нет магазина!!!

Цитата:
— Я вижу... орла.
— А я — решку.
— Здесь всё дело в плоскости.
— Что ты видишь с этого угла? Жив.
— А с этого? Мёртв.
— Та же монета.
— Но другая плоскость.
— Орёл.
— Решка.
— Мёртв.
— Жив.
норм

There are games that are forgettable, there are games that are ok, and then there are games which are great. This is a great game and should be considered amongst the "gold-standard" of First-Person-Shooters, it combines fun, easy to grasp gameplay with an interesting and exciting narrative, all set in an imaginative and immersive world.

I honestly could not stop playing this game until I had completed it, and I had a hell of a time playing it! I loved exploring Columbia, a city in the sky, I loved mixing and matching combos of weapons and abilities to dispose of my enemies ( picking up some bad guys with giant tendrils of water, then shotgunning them off the side of a building? Hell yeah!)

It was also one of the games that I felt really sad after completing, really left me wanting more.

PROS:
+Great gameplay
+Superb story
+Stylish setting

CONS:
-Finished too soon (10 hours)
-Not as survivaly as the original Bioshock games
-Some of the stuff that happens in the game messes with your head
I loved the game play in the main game as well as the DLC. If you're a fan of the others, you'll love this one just as much!

Electromagnetic waves are produced by the motion of electrically charged particles. These waves are also called "electromagnetic radiation" because they radiate from the electrically charged particles. They travel through empty space as well as through air and other substances.
Just play it!And you'll know how great it is!
I enjoyed this game, good gameplay and all that. But the ending... it's insane, took me a couple days to run it all through my mind. If you like a good story, this is for you.
Gra o samego  początku sprawia jest tak dobra że moja dziewczyna postanowiła przejąć moje konto :D

Simply put, this game is one of those (as a gamer) I feel everyone should play as it's worth it. Between the gameplay, versatility, setting & story, the game just hits everything in such a stellar way it's one of those as a long time gamer, I'll go back to play through every few years in the future as it's just that damn good. Best played with a controller & well worth your time & money so get playing & have fun with this gem.

Мистер Дэвит...Приведи к нам девчёнку и мы в расчете!
Как и все части Bioshock - игра шедевр, настоящее произведение искусства! Когда начинаешь играть, начинаешь читать книгу или смотреть фильм. И не можешь остановиться, всё происходит на одном дыхании.Отличная история, прекрасная подача, лучшие традиции Bioshock. Вобщем игра определённо заслуживает внимания, времени и потраченных денег!

This game. Oh my god this game is one of the best games I have ever played in my entire life next to Dishonored. A reboot for the original Bioshock games, does not disappoint even just a little bit. The action was straight up amazing. The guns and skillz in the game fits everything so much. The environment was something that you felt you could be a part of. The story was THE BEST so far in my book. This game's immersion and character development is top notch of its generation. I would recommend this game to ANYONE that loves great storytelling and unimaginable immersion. 11/10
